title: Computer Science Fundamentals
description: Essential computer science topics for learning

topics.name: TCP/IP Protocol
topics.summary: Transmission Control Protocol for reliable network communication
key_points: Includes error checking and flow control
differences: TCP is connection-based while UDP is connectionless
TCP guarantees delivery, UDP does not
questions: What are the three steps in TCP handshake?

topics.name: Data Structures
topics.summary: Fundamental ways to organize and store data
differences: Stack is LIFO, Queue is FIFO
Array has fixed size, Linked List is dynamic
questions: What is the difference between Stack and Queue?
When would you use a linked list over an array?

topics.name: Machine Learning Basics
topics.summary: Introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms
questions: What is the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?
How does a neural network learn?
